By Laila Kearney

articles.title: Ex-IndiGo & Udaan CFO Pande is CEO of InterGlobe - IndiaTimes

articles.title: Mumbai redevelopment: Rustomjee Group to redevelop 2 housing societies having Rs 1,200 crore GDV - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The project in Malad area of Mumbai will include component of rehousing 342 existing members of both the societies, and this redevelopment will lead to sale potential of 3.42 lakh sq ft of RERA carpet area, according to company statement

articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Paytm surpasses 100 million monthly transacting users for the first time in Q3 FY24 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Paytm's founder and CEO, Vijay Shekhar Sharma, called the achievement of reaching 100 million active customers a 'key milestone'. The company's revenue increased by 38% annually to  ₹2,850.5 crore in the October-December quarter.
articles.content: The Indian payments and financial services company, Paytm, crossed the 100 million active customers milestone in the previous quarter, the company said in a press release on Monday.  The fintech firm… [+2172 chars]
